caption: Several people were gathered around a table, deep in discussion about something important. As they conversed, a man approached, and one man and one woman at the table issued some instructions to him. The man nodded in agreement. Before leaving, the woman expressed something very sorrowful to him. Afterward, the man departed, but the atmosphere remained heavy.The others around the table continued their conversation for a while, and eventually, they too left the table. In another location, seemingly a campsite, it was snowing all around, surrounded by a forest. Some people were fetching water and packing up their belongings. They seemed to be stationed here, possibly as a part of an army or a group.
